desc: The Crystallized Cavern is a Canadian online crystal shop that sells crystals, jewelry, oracle cards, metaphysical books, incense, incense holders, crystal grids, altar pieces, rare crystal specimens and more! We ship to Canada and the USA. Check out our website today!

layout.text: Thank you for visiting us! Follow us @thecrystallizedcavern on Instagram for exclusive sales, updates, and so much more!
